snippet: Buoyed by victories in four states, advocates of same-sex-marriage rights plan to press their cause in Delaware, Hawaii, Illinois, Rhode Island, Minnesota, New Jersey and Oregon.
abstract: Advocates of same-sex marriage rights, buoyed by ballot victories in four states, plan to push several other state legislatures toward legalization while also pressing their cause in federal courts; find that rapid shift in public opinion is bolstering cause as more people grow used to idea of same-sex marriage and become acquainted with openly gay people and couples.
lead_paragraph: Buoyed by victories in four states, advocates of same-sex-marriage rights plan to press their cause in Delaware, Hawaii, Illinois, Rhode Island, Minnesota, New Jersey and Oregon.

headline.seo: Advocates of Gay Marriage Extend Their Campaign
headline.main: Push Expands for Legalizing Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Push Expands For Legalizing Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
